page.welcome: Welcome to Wildcat.chat! This platform provides AI-powered chat bots and TTS services for Twitch streamers.

chatsage.title: ChatSage Bot
chatsage.description: AI-powered chatbot with contextual responses, web search, games, and more.
chatsage.feature1: Ask questions and get AI responses

wildcatTts.title: WildcatTTS TTS Bot
wildcatTts.description: Advanced Text-to-Speech bot with music generation capabilities.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.step1: Visit app.wildcat.chat to set up your ChatSage bot
gettingStarted.step2: Visit tts.wildcat.chat for WildcatTTS TTS dashboard
gettingStarted.step5: Check the documentation pages for detailed command references
